faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Voiceover Recording

items.title: What types of projects can I use voiceovers for?
items.description: Our voiceover feature is perfect for explainer videos, podcasts, presentations, e-learning courses, and more. Enhance any audio-visual project with high-quality narration.

items.title: Is there a limit on the length of scripts?
items.description: You can input scripts up to 1000 words for voice generation. For longer projects, consider breaking them into smaller segments.

items.title: Can I choose different voice styles?
items.description: Yes! We offer a range of voices, including male, female, and various accents, allowing you to select the best fit for your project.

items.title: How quickly can I get my voiceover?
items.description: You can expect to have your voiceover generated within seconds of submitting your script. It’s quick and efficient!

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Audio Experience?
footer.description: Try our Voiceover Recording feature now and elevate your content. No sign-up required.
